column5: If you are heading west in Massachusetts from Lee to Lenox, you will come across this funky shop with an ice cream place next door. Inside is an amazing collection of antiques⁠—from old signage and advertisements⁠—to retro vending machines and other forms of vintage memorabilia. Wander around, take photos, and ask questions.
column6: Journey through vintage Americana inside this small Massachusetts shop.
column8: 395 Laurel St; Lee, Massachusetts, 01238; United States
